Package camzup.pfriendly

Class TextEntity2

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Entity
camzup.core.Entity2
camzup.core.MeshEntity2
camzup.pfriendly.ImageEntity2
camzup.pfriendly.TextEntity2
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBlenderWritable, IEntity, IOriented2, ISpatial2, ISvgWritable, IUtils, IVolume, IVolume2, java.lang.Iterable<Mesh2>
public class TextEntity2
extends ImageEntity2
A convenience to create billboards which present text strings as a single image texture. Useful for cases where unchanging text needs to be displayed on the screen. Not intended for use with the AWT renderer.

    • TextEntity2

      public TextEntity2​(PFont font, java.lang.String text, Color tint, int leading, int kerning, int alignHoriz, int alignVert, float scale)
      Creates a mesh entity from a billboard with a texture that displays text.
      Parameters:
      font - the Processing font
      text - the string of text
      tint - the color
      scale - the entity scale
      leading - spacing between lines
      kerning - spacing between characters
      alignHoriz - the horizontal alignment
      alignVert - the vertical alignment
      See Also:
      ZImage.fromText(PFont, String, int, int, int, int), ZImage.premul(PImage, PImage)
